request.description:
## Details: 1. Handshake must be called before sign-in and sign-up (Mobile/web App) APIs 2. Handshake has expiry of 5 minutes i.e. if user does not sign-up/sign-up in 5 min, it will expire and sign-up/in will fail. Front-end shall call handshake again to sign-up/in. 3. Upon handshake expiry, an http status code 503 is received. In such case, call client-handshake API. | **Parameters** | **Notes** | | --- | --- | | `agent_iam (string) (mandatory)` | Enum:
\- if user is logging in from mobile app then
`agent_iam = "mobile-app"`
\- if user is logging in from web then:
`agent_iam = "web-app"` |

## Details:

- Shall be called within 5 minutes after client-handshake API call.
- Upon http status code 503, call client-handshake API again and use the token (received in response of client-handshake) in this API.
    

| **Parameters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `name (string) (mandatory)` | Full name of the User |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | email of the user |
| `password (string) (mandatory)` | password of the user |
| `companyName (string) (optional)` | company name (if any) |
| `companyDomain (string) (optional)` | company domain (if any) |
| `companySize (INT) (optional)` | company size (if any) |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token in Authorization header. Token is received in client-handshake API.

## Details:

- This API is used to verify the email (entered in signup API) with a 6 digit OTP
- After verifying the OTP, the user is signed in, hence you will call the list workspaces API.
    

| **Parameters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | `email of the user that was entered in sign up API` |
| `otp (string) (mandatory)` | OTP code that is received in the mail. |

> IMPORTANT: This API does not require any token. But on a successful OTP verification, it issues a token which is used in further APIs (i.e. APIs called after sign in)

## Details:

- Upon successful sign in, a **1 day session** is maintained for the user.
- After 24 hours, session will get expired and a response with http status code 503 will be received on the APIs that are called after sign-in.
- Upon http status code 503, call client-handshake API again, then sign-in API for a new user session.
    

| **Paramters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | `valid email of the user` |
| `password (string) (mandatory)` | `password for user account` |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token (in Authorization header) that is received in client-handshake API

## Details:

- This API is used to upload profile picture of the current user
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `file (png, jpg ...etc) (mandatory)` | `profile picture of the user` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used change the User Full Name.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `full_nake (string) (mandatory)` | `Full Name of the user to be chnaged` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to log a user out
    

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token in Authorization header without Bearer keyword. This token is received in client handshake API

## Details: 1. Handshake must be called before sign-in and sign-up (Mobile/web App) APIs 2. Handshake has expiry of 5 minutes i.e. if user does not sign-up/sign-up in 5 min, it will expire and sign-up/in will fail. Front-end shall call handshake again to sign-up/in. 3. Upon handshake expiry, an http status code 503 is received. In such case, call client-handshake API. | **Parameters** | **Notes** | | --- | --- | | `agent_iam (string) (mandatory)` | Enum:
\- if user is logging in from mobile app then
`agent_iam = "mobile-app"`
\- if user is logging in from web then:
`agent_iam = "web-app"` |

## Details:

- Upon successful sign in, a **1 day session** is maintained for the user.
- After 24 hours, session will get expired and a response with http status code 503 will be received on the APIs that are called after sign-in.
- Upon http status code 503, call client-handshake API again, then sign-in API for a new user session.
    

| **Paramters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | `valid email of the user` |
| `password (string) (mandatory)` | `password for user account` |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token (in Authorization header) that is received in client-handshake API

exec: console.log("Collection Variable is_listWorkspaces_called is set to 1");

request.description:
## Details:

- Doesn't require request body.
- Shall be called right after user successfully logs into the mobile/web app.
- This API fetches user workspaces (if any).
- If received empty array, then show a "create workspace" button on the front-end.
- Upon http status code 503, call mobile/web app handshake again and then sign in user.
    

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) received in the response on sign-in API or Email OTP verification API

- Upon http status code 503, call mobile/web app handshake again and then sign in user.
    

| **Parameters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_title (string) (mandatory)` | Title for the workspace being created |
| `business_type (string) (optional)` | if any |
| `company_size (string) (optional)` | if any |
|  |  |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in authorization header) that is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

| `project_kuid (string) (optional)` | `kuid of the project` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

request.description:
## Details:

- This API is used tosearch bugs.
- Upon http status code 403, show a relevant message i.e. user does not have permission to create project in a specific workspace.
- Upon http status code 503, call mobile/web app handshake again and then sign in user.
- NOTE: Make sure, among parameters: search_query, tags, assignees, status, at least 1 parameter must not be empty.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is creating project` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `title of the project` |
| `search_query (string) (mandatory)` | `the text to be searched in bugs' title or description   (can be sent empty)` |
| `tags (array) (mandatory)` | `array of tags ids   (can be sent empty array)` |
| `assignees (array) (mandatory)` | `array of assignees' ids   (can be sent empty array)` |
| `status (string) (mandatory)` | `resolution status of the bug i.e to_do, in-progress, done` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to update the workspace title.
- Upon http status code 400, show a relevant message i.e. Records not Found
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is updating workspace Title` |
| `title (string) (mandatory)` | `title of the workspace` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to get access roles for invitee in workspace
- workspace Owner have full access to invite someone and workspace admin can only invite as a workspace-admin and member
- It will show empty member array if members not found in the workspace
- Upon http status code 400, show a relevant message i.e. something went wrong.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which you are Inviting member` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to update the Membership Access.
- Upon http status code 400, show a relevant message i.e. Records not found
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the user is loggedIn` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |
| `member_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `Kuid of the memnber` |
| `scope (sting) (mandatory)` | `scope of the member` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to invite user in a workspace
- Sign In is mandatory before this API
- A User can only invite to someone if A Current user is workspace's Owner or Current user role is shared workspace-admin
- upone http status code (200). A link will send to invitee on the given email
    

| **Parameters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid` `(string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the workspace in which you want to invite` |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | email of the Invitee |
| `role_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of Access Role` |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token in Authorization header. Token is received in client-handshake API.

Request HeadersAuthorization

## Details:

- This API is used to update workspace Avatar
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the workspace` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to delete the workspace
- Upon http status code 400, show a relevant message i.e. workspace not founde.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the workspace` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details: 1. Handshake must be called before sign-in and sign-up (Mobile/web App) APIs 2. Handshake has expiry of 5 minutes i.e. if user does not sign-up/sign-up in 5 min, it will expire and sign-up/in will fail. Front-end shall call handshake again to sign-up/in. 3. Upon handshake expiry, an http status code 503 is received. In such case, call client-handshake API. | **Parameters** | **Notes** | | --- | --- | | `agent_iam (string) (mandatory)` | Enum:
\- if user is logging in from mobile app then
`agent_iam = "mobile-app"`
\- if user is logging in from web then:
`agent_iam = "web-app"` |

## Details:

- Upon successful sign in, a **1 day session** is maintained for the user.
- After 24 hours, session will get expired and a response with http status code 503 will be received on the APIs that are called after sign-in.
- Upon http status code 503, call client-handshake API again, then sign-in API for a new user session.
    

| **Paramters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | `valid email of the user` |
| `password (string) (mandatory)` | `password for user account` |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token (in Authorization header) that is received in client-handshake API

## Details:

- This API is used to create a project in a workspace owned by logged in user.
- Upon http status code 403, show a relevant message i.e. user does not have permission to create project in a specific workspace.
- Upon http status code 503, call mobile/web app handshake again and then sign in user.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is creating project` |
| `project_title (string) (mandatory)` | `title of the project` |
| `app_id_identifier (string) (optional)` | `app package id of the project being created` |
| `platformType (string) (string) (mandatory)` | `enum => android/ios/web/tickets` |
| `environment (string) (optional)` | `enum => sandbox/staging/production` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API fetches user owned workspace projects' list.
- If received empty array, it means user doesn't have any projects in the specific workspace.
- Upon http status code 503, call mobile/web app handshake again and then sign in user.

| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the workspace whose projects are being listed. (kuid is received in user-workspaces API's response)` |

## Details:

- Doesn't require request body.
- Shall be called right after user successfully logs into the mobile/web app.
- This API fetches user workspaces (if any).
- If received empty array, then show a "create workspace" button on the front-end.
- Upon http status code 503, call mobile/web app handshake again and then sign in user.
    

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) received in the response on sign-in API or Email OTP verification API

request.description:
## Details:

- This API is used to get access roles for invitee in workspace
- workspace Owner have full access to invite someone and workspace admin can only invite as a workspace-admin and member
- It will show empty member array if members not found in the workspace
- Upon http status code 400, show a relevant message i.e. something went wrong.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which you are Inviting member` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to fetch shared members
- It will show empty member array if members not found in the workspace/project
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which you are finding members` |
| `project_kuid (string) (optional)` | `kuid of the project` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

response.name: Workspace (200)

exec: console.log("Collection Variable is_listWorkspaces_called is set to 1");
// Check if the property exists in the first element of the array
console.log("The property 'p_kuid' does not exist in the first element of 'workspace_projects' array.");
console.log("The 'workspace_projects' array is either empty or does not exist.");

request.description:
## Details:

- This API fetches user owned workspace projects' list.
- If received empty array, it means user doesn't have any projects in the specific workspace.
- Upon http status code 503, call mobile/web app handshake again and then sign in user.
    

| **Parameters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the workspace whose projects are being listed. (kuid is received in user-workspaces API's response)` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to show peonding Members.
- If received an empty array, means user doesn't have any pending members.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the the user is logged` |
| `project_kuid (string) (optional)` | `kuid of the project` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to invite user in a workspace
- Sign In is mandatory before this API
- A User can only invite to someone if A Current user is workspace's Owner or Current user role is shared workspace-admin
- upone http status code (200). A link will send to invitee on the given email
    

| **Parameters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid` `(string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the workspace in which you want to invite` |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | email of the Invitee |
| `role_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of Access Role` |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token in Authorization header. Token is received in client-handshake API.

Request HeadersAuthorization

## Details:

- This API is used to invite user in a Project
- Sign In is mandatory before this API
- A User can only invite to someone if A current user is workspace Owner or current user role is shared workspace-admin or shared project-admin
- upone http status code (200). A link will send to invitee on the given email
    

| **Parameters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid` `(string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the workspace in which you want to invite` |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | email of the Invitee |
| `project_kuid(string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project in which you want to invite` |
| `role_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of Access Role` |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token in Authorization header. Token is received in client-handshake API.

Request HeadersAuthorization

EndFragment

## Details: 1. Handshake must be called before sign-in and sign-up (Mobile/web App) APIs 2. Handshake has expiry of 5 minutes i.e. if user does not sign-up/sign-up in 5 min, it will expire and sign-up/in will fail. Front-end shall call handshake again to sign-up/in. 3. Upon handshake expiry, an http status code 503 is received. In such case, call client-handshake API. | **Parameters** | **Notes** | | --- | --- | | `agent_iam (string) (mandatory)` | Enum:
\- if user is logging in from mobile app then
`agent_iam = "mobile-app"`
\- if user is logging in from web then:
`agent_iam = "web-app"` |

## Details:

- Shall be called within 5 minutes after client-handshake API call.
- Upon http status code 503, call client-handshake API again and use the token (received in response of client-handshake) in this API.
    

| **Parameters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `name (string) (mandatory)` | Full name of the User |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | email of the user |
| `password (string) (mandatory)` | password of the user |
| `companyName (string) (optional)` | company name (if any) |
| `companyDomain (string) (optional)` | company domain (if any) |
| `companySize (INT) (optional)` | company size (if any) |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token in Authorization header. Token is received in client-handshake API.

## Details:

- This API is used to verify the email (entered in signup API) with a 6 digit OTP
- After verifying the OTP, the user is signed in, hence you will call the list workspaces API.
    

| **Parameters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | `email of the user that was entered in sign up API` |
| `otp (string) (mandatory)` | OTP code that is received in the mail. |

> IMPORTANT: This API does not require any token. But on a successful OTP verification, it issues a token which is used in further APIs (i.e. APIs called after sign in)

## Details:

- Upon successful sign in, a **1 day session** is maintained for the user.
- After 24 hours, session will get expired and a response with http status code 503 will be received on the APIs that are called after sign-in.
- Upon http status code 503, call client-handshake API again, then sign-in API for a new user session.
    

| **Paramters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | `valid email of the user` |
| `password (string) (mandatory)` | `password for user account` |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token (in Authorization header) that is received in client-handshake API

## Details:

- This API is used to Revoke Invitee.
- Upon http status code 400, show a relevant message i.e. Records not foun.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the user is logged in` |
| `project_kuid (string) (optional)` | `kuid of the project` |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | `email of the invitee` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details: 1. Handshake must be called before sign-in and sign-up (Mobile/web App) APIs 2. Handshake has expiry of 5 minutes i.e. if user does not sign-up/sign-up in 5 min, it will expire and sign-up/in will fail. Front-end shall call handshake again to sign-up/in. 3. Upon handshake expiry, an http status code 503 is received. In such case, call client-handshake API. | **Parameters** | **Notes** | | --- | --- | | `agent_iam (string) (mandatory)` | Enum:
\- if user is logging in from mobile app then
`agent_iam = "mobile-app"`
\- if user is logging in from web then:
`agent_iam = "web-app"` |

## Details:

- Upon successful sign in, a **1 day session** is maintained for the user.
- After 24 hours, session will get expired and a response with http status code 503 will be received on the APIs that are called after sign-in.
- Upon http status code 503, call client-handshake API again, then sign-in API for a new user session.
    

| **Paramters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | `valid email of the user` |
| `password (string) (mandatory)` | `password for user account` |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token (in Authorization header) that is received in client-handshake API

request.description:
## Details:

- This API is used to fetch shared members
- It will show empty member array if members not found in the workspace/project
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which you are finding members` |
| `project_kuid (string) (optional)` | `kuid of the project` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

response.name: Workspace (200)

request.description:
## Details:

- This API is used tosearch bugs.
- Upon http status code 403, show a relevant message i.e. user does not have permission to create project in a specific workspace.
- Upon http status code 503, call mobile/web app handshake again and then sign in user.
- NOTE: Make sure, among parameters: search_query, tags, assignees, status, at least 1 parameter must not be empty.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is creating project` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `title of the project` |
| `search_query (string) (mandatory)` | `the text to be searched in bugs' title or description   (can be sent empty)` |
| `tags (array) (mandatory)` | `array of tags ids   (can be sent empty array)` |
| `assignees (array) (mandatory)` | `array of assignees' ids   (can be sent empty array)` |
| `status (string) (mandatory)` | `resolution status of the bug i.e to_do, in-progress, done` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used tosearch bugs.
- Upon http status code 403, show a relevant message i.e. user does not have permission to create project in a specific workspace.
- Upon http status code 503, call mobile/web app handshake again and then sign in user.
- NOTE: Make sure, among parameters: search_query, tags, assignees, status, at least 1 parameter must not be empty.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is creating project` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `title of the project` |
| `search_query (string) (mandatory)` | `the text to be searched in bugs' title or description (can be sent empty)` |
| `tags (array) (mandatory)` | `array of tags ids (can be sent empty array)` |
| `assignees (array) (mandatory)` | `array of assignees' ids (can be sent empty array)` |
| `status (string) (mandatory)` | `resolution status of the bug i.e to_do, in-progress, done` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

request.description:
## Details:

- This API is used to post comment on an issue (bug / crash)
    

| **Parameters** | **Data type** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (required)` | `string` | `kuid of the current workspace` |
| `project_kuid` | `string` | `kuid of the current project` |
| `issueType` | `string (enum = "bug" / "crash")` | `it is either bug or crash` |
| `issueKuid` | `string` | `kuid of the issue` |
| `userKuids` | `array` | `if the author of comment mentions assignees, their kuids will be added to the array and sent it in this param. If no assignees are mentioned then this array would be sent empty.` |
| `comment` | `string` | `text of the comment` |

StartFragment

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

EndFragment

### Expected Response:

``` json
{
    "workspace_kuid": "---",
    "project_kuid": "---",
    "token": "---",
    "message": "success"
}

```

##

## Details:

| **Parameters** | **Data type** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (required)` | `string` | `kuid of the current workspace` |
| project_kuid `(required)` | string | kuid of the current project |
| issueType `(required)` | string (enum = bug / crash) | if the comments on a bug are being fetched then issueType = "bug". If comments on a crash are being fetched then issueType = "crash" |
| issueKuid `(required)` | string | kuid of the issue |

StartFragment

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

### Expected Response:

``` json
{
    "workspace_kuid": "---",
    "project_kuid": "---",
    "token": "---",
    "comments": [
        {
            "userKuid": "---",
            "userName": "---",
            "comment": "---",
            "postedOn": "---"
        },
        ...
    ]
}

```

response.name: Success (200) plain text

request.description:
# Details:

StartFragment

- This API is used to delete comments
    

EndFragment  
  

| **Parameters** | **Data Type** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (required)` | `string` | `kuid of the workspace` |
| `project_kuid (required)` | `string` | `kuid of the project` |
| `comment_kuid(required)` | `array` | `kuids of the comments that to be deleted` |

StartFragment

> IMPORTANT: payload shall be encrypted with clientSecret (workspace kuid) and projectToken (project kuid) shall be sent in Authorization header 
  

EndFragment

``` json
{
    "workspace_kuid": "---",
    "project_kuid": "---",
    "token": "---",
    "comments": [
        {
            "userKuid": "---",
            "userName": "---",
            "comment": "---",
            "postedOn": "---"
        },
        ...
    ]
}

```

## Details:

- This API is used to update bug assignee.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is creating project` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `title of the project` |
| `bug_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the bug` |
| `assignee_kuid (array) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the assignee` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

response.name: Update Bug Assignee

request.description:
## Details:

- This API is used to fetch Bug filters.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the workspace` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to apply bugs filters.
- NOTE: Make sure, among parameters: label, operating_system, version, reporter, assignees, status, at least 1 parameter must not be empty.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is searching bug` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |
| `label (string) (optional)` | `the text to be searched in bugs' title (can be sent empty)` |
| `version (array) (optiona)` | `version of the bug (can be sent empty array)` |
| `assignees (array) (optional)` | `array of assignees' ids (can be sent empty array)` |
| `status (array) (optional)` | `resolution status of the bug i.e to_do, in-progress, done` |
| `operating_system (string) (optional)` | `os of device (can be sent empty array)` |
| `date (string) (optional)` | `date of the bug (can be sent empty array)` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used delete the bug.
- Upon http status code 400, show a relevant message i.e. bug not found
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is deleting bug` |
| `bug_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the bug` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

``` json { "token":"xyz", "reporteeName": "xyz", "reporteeEmail": "abc@mail.com", "assignedTo": 12, "bugDescription": "some bug description", "bugTitle": "Header is not responsive", "screenDensity": "376.57 ppi", "screenResolution": "51202880", "userActivityLogs": {"events": {"click": "Main screen"}}, "isEmulator": false, "isRooted": false, "freeMemory": "1024 MBs", "freeDiskMemory": "2048 MBs", "batteryLevel": "70%", "isOnBattery": false, "appPermissions": { "location": true, "camera": true, "microphone": true, "GPS": true, "Gallery": false } } ``` > TODO: Above payload will be sent as encrypted in beta/production environment. ### Details | **Parameter** | **Notes** | | --- | --- | | `assignee_kuid (array of strings)` | Assignee of the bug | | `tag_kuid (array of strings)` | List of tags associated with a bug being submitted | | `isEmulator (boolean)` | Reflects if the app is running on emulator | | `isRooted (boolean)` | Reflects if the device is rooted | | `freeMemory (string)` | available RAM of the device | | `freeDiskMemory (string)` | Free Disk storage of device | | `batteryLevel (string)` | Device's battery percentage | | `isOnBattery (boolean)` | Reflects if the device is on battery or not | | `appPermissions (JSON object)` | Permissions given to the app by the user | | `token` | Received in SDK Client Handshake API
(Mandatory) | | `reporteeName` | Name of bug reportee
**\- Optional** if user is reporting anonymously
\- Mandatory if user is reporting after login | | `reporteeEmail` | Email of reportee
(Mandatory) | | `assignedTo` | You'll get information/data for this parameter from another API.
(optional) | | `suggestingAnImprovement` | suggestingAnImprovement is a string | | `userActivityLogs` | userActivityLogs is an array | | `bugDescription` | Description about bug being logged
(Mandatory) | | `bugTitle` | Title of the bug
(Mandatory) | | `screenDensity` | Screen density of device
(Mandatory) | | `screenResolution` | Screen resolution of device
(Mandatory) | | `userActivityLogs` | Will contain your captured activity logs data (extracted from SQLite) in a JSON format.
(Mandatory) | | `test_case_ids` | test case Ids in which you want to report bug |

## Details:

- This API is used to fetch Crash filters.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the workspace` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to fetch Crash Listing with unique Devices
- Upon http status code 403, show a relevant message
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is fetching crashes` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project in which the logged in user is fetching crashes` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

request.description:
## Details:

- This API is used tosearch bugs.
- Upon http status code 403, show a relevant message i.e. user does not have permission to create project in a specific workspace.
- Upon http status code 503, call mobile/web app handshake again and then sign in user.
- NOTE: Make sure, among parameters: search_query, tags, assignees, status, at least 1 parameter must not be empty.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is creating project` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `title of the project` |
| `search_query (string) (mandatory)` | `the text to be searched in bugs' title or description   (can be sent empty)` |
| `tags (array) (mandatory)` | `array of tags ids   (can be sent empty array)` |
| `assignees (array) (mandatory)` | `array of assignees' ids   (can be sent empty array)` |
| `status (string) (mandatory)` | `resolution status of the bug i.e to_do, in-progress, done` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used tosearch bugs.
- Upon http status code 403, show a relevant message i.e. user does not have permission to create project in a specific workspace.
- Upon http status code 503, call mobile/web app handshake again and then sign in user.
- NOTE: Make sure, among parameters: search_query, tags, assignees, status, at least 1 parameter must not be empty.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is creating project` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `title of the project` |
| `search_query (string) (mandatory)` | `the text to be searched in bugs' title or description (can be sent empty)` |
| `version (array) (mandatory)` | `array of hostApp version (can be sent empty array)` |
| `assignees (array) (mandatory)` | `array of assignees' ids (can be sent empty array)` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

request.description:
## Details:

- API is used to update Crash Assignee
- Upon http status code 400 Records not found
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is creating project` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |
| `crash_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the crash` |
| `assignee_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `assignee_kuid of the crash` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- API is used update Crash Status
- Upon http status code 400 Records not found
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is creating project` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |
| `crash_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `Kuid of the crash` |
| `status_kuid (array) (mandatory)` | `status_kuid of the crash` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to fetch Crash filters.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the workspace` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to apply crash filters.
- NOTE: Make sure, among parameters: label, operating_system, version, reporter, assignees, status, at least 1 parameter must not be empty.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is searching crash` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |
| `label (string) (optional)` | `the text to be searched in crash' title (can be sent empty)` |
| `version (array) (optiona)` | `version of the crash (can be sent empty array)` |
| `assignees (array) (optional)` | `array of assignees' ids (can be sent empty array)` |
| `status (array) (optional)` | `resolution status of the crash i.e to_do, in-progress, done` |
| `operating_system (string) (optional)` | `os of device (can be sent empty array)` |
| `date (string) (optional)` | `date of the crash (can be sent empty array)` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

request.description:
## Details:

| **Parameters** | **Data type** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (required)` | `string` | `kuid of the current workspace` |
| `project_kuid (required)` | `string` | `kuid of the current project` |

### Expected Response:

``` json
{
    "status": true  | false,
    "notifications": [
     { 
        "triggeringSource": "---",
        "sourceType": "---",
        "sourceIssueKuid": "---",
        "authorName": "---",
        "isRead": 0 | 1,
        "activityTime": "DateTime"
     }
     ...
    ]
}

```

## Details:

- This API is used to delete a specific crash.
- Upon http status code 400, show a relevant message i.e. Crash not found
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is deleting crash` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |
| `crash_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the crash` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details: 1. Handshake must be called before sign-in and sign-up (Mobile/web App) APIs 2. Handshake has expiry of 5 minutes i.e. if user does not sign-up/sign-up in 5 min, it will expire and sign-up/in will fail. Front-end shall call handshake again to sign-up/in. 3. Upon handshake expiry, an http status code 503 is received. In such case, call client-handshake API. | **Parameters** | **Notes** | | --- | --- | | `agent_iam (string) (mandatory)` | Enum:
\- if user is logging in from mobile app then
`agent_iam = "mobile-app"`
\- if user is logging in from web then:
`agent_iam = "web-app"` |

## Details:

- Upon successful sign in, a **1 day session** is maintained for the user.
- After 24 hours, session will get expired and a response with http status code 503 will be received on the APIs that are called after sign-in.
- Upon http status code 503, call client-handshake API again, then sign-in API for a new user session.
    

| **Paramters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | `valid email of the user` |
| `password (string) (mandatory)` | `password for user account` |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token (in Authorization header) that is received in client-handshake API

## Details:

- This API is used to setup feecback Engine and also used to update feedback.
- if feedback already exist in the database then this api will update the feedback with the given template_kuid
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |
| `unhappy_threshold (number) (mandatory)` | `uphappy_threshold is a number from 1-5` |
| `known_issues_list (array) (optional)` | `known_issues_list is an array of string (can be sent empty array)` |
| `allow_custom_input (number) (mandatory)` | `allow_custom_input is a number (0,1)` |
| `should_happy_rate (number) (mandatory)` | `should_happy_rate is a number (0,1)` |
| `rating_page_url(string) (optional)` | `rating_page_url is a string and can be send epmty` |
| `display_on_regular_schedule_n (number) (mandatory)` | `display_on_regular_schedule_n is a number (0,1)` |
| `n_regular_app_launches(number) (mandatory)` | `n_regular_app_launchesis a number` |
| `display_on_release_schedule_n (number) (mandatory)` | `display_on_release_schedule_n is a number (0,1)` |
| `n_new_release_launches(number) (mandatory)` | `n_new_release_launchesa number` |
| `is_active (number) (mandatory)` | `is_active is a number (0,1)` |
| `template_kuid` `(string) (optional)` | `kuid of the customer feedback` |
| `frequencyForHappyCustomers_inMonths (number) (mandatory)` | `frequency For Happy Customers in Months` |
| `frequencyForUnhappyCustomers_inMonths (number) (mandatory)` | `frequency For Unhappy Customers in Months` |

> `IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.`

## Details:

- This API is used to enable or disable feedback.
    

| **Parameters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |
| `de_activate (number) (mandatory)` | `de_activate is a number (0,1)` |

> IMPORTANT: This API does not require any token. But on a successful OTP verification, it issues a token which is used in further APIs (i.e. APIs called after sign in)

## Details:

- This API is used to fetch Users Feedback.
    

| **Parameters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the workspace` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |

> IMPORTANT: This API does not require any token. But on a successful OTP verification, it issues a token which is used in further APIs (i.e. APIs called after sign in)

## Details:

- This API is used to set up release force update;.
    

| **Parameters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |
| `update_type (string) (optional)` | `updateType (Optional or mandatory)` |
| `message_title (string) (mandatory)` | `message title of the version` |
| `message_body (string) (mandatory)` | `message body of the version` |
| `positive_cta (string) (mandatory)` | `positiveCTA of the version` |
| `negative_cta (string) (mandatory)` | `negativeCTA of the version` |
| `release_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the version release` |
| `template_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `template_kuid of the release` |

> IMPORTANT: This API does not require any token. But on a successful OTP verification, it issues a token which is used in further APIs (i.e. APIs called after sign in)

## Details:

- This API is used to fetch release details.
    

| **Parameters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |

> IMPORTANT: This API does not require any token. But on a successful OTP verification, it issues a token which is used in further APIs (i.e. APIs called after sign in)

## Details:

- This API is used to fetch releases note
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `release_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `release_kuid in which you want to fetch release note` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project_kuid in which you want to fetch releases note` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API. 
  

EndFragment

## Details:

This API is used for enable/disable sdk

If release_kuid will be empty then sdk will enable/disable at project lavel

| **Parameters** | **Data type** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `release_kuid (required) (can be empty)` | `string` | `kuid of the release that you want to disable` |
| `project_kuid (required)` | `string` | `kuid of the current project` |
| `workspace_kuid (required)` | `(string)` | `kuid of the workspace` |
| `sdk_monitoring (required)` | `number` | `0 for disable sdk and 1 for enable sdk` |

### Expected Response:

## Details:

| **Parameters** | **Data type** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (required)` | `string` | `kuid of the current workspace` |
| `project_kuid (required)` | `string` | `kuid of the current project` |

### Expected Response:

``` json
{
    "status": true  | false,
    "notifications": [
     { 
        "triggeringSource": "---",
        "sourceType": "---",
        "sourceIssueKuid": "---",
        "authorName": "---",
        "isRead": 0 | 1,
        "activityTime": "DateTime"
     }
     ...
    ]
}

```

## Details:

| `negative_cta (string) (mandatory)` | `negativeCTA of the version` |
| `message_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the message` |

> IMPORTANT: This API does not require any token. But on a successful OTP verification, it issues a token which is used in further APIs (i.e. APIs called after sign in)

## Details:

- This API is used to fetch Bug filters.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the workspace` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to apply bugs filters.
- NOTE: Make sure, among parameters: label, operating_system, version, reporter, assignees, status, at least 1 parameter must not be empty.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is searching bug` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |
| `label (string) (optional)` | `the text to be searched in bugs' title (can be sent empty)` |
| `version (array) (optiona)` | `version of the bug (can be sent empty array)` |
| `assignees (array) (optional)` | `array of assignees' ids (can be sent empty array)` |
| `status (array) (optional)` | `resolution status of the bug i.e to_do, in-progress, done` |
| `operating_system (string) (optional)` | `os of device (can be sent empty array)` |
| `date (string) (optional)` | `date of the bug (can be sent empty array)` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to fetch Crash filters.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the workspace` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

request.description:
## Details:

- This API is used to generate and send OTP or send Link for reset password
- After this API if user is from mobile-app 'Otp verification Reset Password mob' will be call else if user is from web-app then 'Link Verification Reset Password web' will be called
- Upon successful reset password, a **1 day expiry** is maintained for that OTP or Link.
- Upon http status code 400, 'bad request'
- Upon http status code 401, 'user not exist'
    

| **Paramters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | `valid email of the user` |
|  |  |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token (in Authorization header) that is received in client-handshake API

response.name: success for web (200)
success for OTP (200)
User does not exist (401)

request.description:
## Details:

- This APi is used to verify the OTP that are sent on the email
- This API will call After 'Reset Password mob/web' API and Before 'Create New Password mob/web' API
- After 24 hours, OTP will get expired and a response with http status code 400.
- Upon http status code 400, call reset-password API again
    

| **Paramters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | `valid email of the user` |
| `request_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `request_kuid that received in reset-password response` |
| `otp (string) (mandatory)` | `valid otp that are sent on the email` |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token (in Authorization header) that is received in client-handshake API

## Details:

- This APi is used to verify the Link that are sent on the email
- This API will call After 'Reset Password mob/web' API and Before 'Create New Password mob/web' API
- Token will be sent on the email. Put that token after the endpoint
- Once link verified it's records will get removed from DB
- After 24 hours, Link will get expired and a response with http status code 400
- Upon http status code 400, call reset-password API again
    

| **Paramters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
|  |  |
|  |  |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token (in Authorization header) that is received in client-handshake API

response.name: User does not exist (401)

request.description:
## Details:

- This API is used to update the user's password
- This APi will call after 'Otp verification Reset Password mob' API OR 'Link Verification Reset Password web' API
- Upon http status code 400, call reset-password API again and repeat process
    

| **Paramters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | `valid email of the user` |
| `password (string) (mandatory)` | `new password` |
| `request_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `request_kuid that received in reset-password response` |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token (in Authorization header) that is received in client-handshake API

response.name: Invalid email or request_kuid (400)

request.description:
## Details:

- This APi is used to resend OTP or Link
- request_kuid is optional for web-app and mandatory for mobile-app
- Upon http status code 400, call reset-password API again and repeat process
    

| **Paramters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | `valid email of the user` |
| `request_kuid (string) (optional for web-app, mandatory for mobile-app)` | `request_kuid that received in reset-password response` |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token (in Authorization header) that is received in client-handshake API

response.name: Success OTP (200)
Success Link (200)

request.description:
## Details:

- Upon successful sign in, a **1 day session** is maintained for the user.
- After 24 hours, session will get expired and a response with http status code 503 will be received on the APIs that are called after sign-in.
- Upon http status code 503, call client-handshake API again, then sign-in API for a new user session.
    

| **Paramters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | `valid email of the user` |
| `password (string) (mandatory)` | `password for user account` |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token (in Authorization header) that is received in client-handshake API

response.name: Success (200)

request.description:
This API returns list of user billings.

Params returned are listed below:

- billingKuid
- payment
- currency
- status
- transactionData (can be null)
- invoice_url (can be null)
- createOn (Date)
    

> IMPORTANT: It requires token in authorization header that is received in /client-handshake API

item.name: Jira

request.description:
## Details:

- This API is used to fetch all projects in Jira
- This API shall be called first in order to integrate with Jira
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `project_kuid(string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project being integrated with jira` |
| `email(string) (mandatory)` | `project_kuid in which you want to fetch releases` |
| `site_url (string) (mandatory)` | `hostname of your jira application` |
| `token (string) (mandatory)` | `api token fetched from jira` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

request.description:
## Details:

- This API is used to fetch issue types in a jira project
- This API shall be called after /jira-projects and before /jira-create-issue API
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `project_kuid(string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project being integrated with jira` |
| `project_key(string) (mandatory)` | `This is get in the response /jira-projects API against "key" parameter` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API. 
  

## Sample success response:

``` json
{
    status: true,
    issueTypes: {
  "expand": "schema,names",
  "issueTypes": [
    {
      "self": "https://yourjirainstance.com/rest/api/2/issuetype/1",
      "id": "1",
      "description": "A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.",
      "iconUrl": "https://yourjirainstance.com/images/icons/issuetypes/bug.png",
      "name": "Bug",
      "subtask": false
    },
    {
      "self": "https://yourjirainstance.com/rest/api/2/issuetype/3",
      "id": "3",
      "description": "A task that needs to be done.",
      "iconUrl": "https://yourjirainstance.com/images/icons/issuetypes/task.png",
      "name": "Task",
      "subtask": false
    }
  ]
}
}

```

| `issue_type(string) (mandatory)` | `name of the issue type which is get in the response /jira-issue-types API against "name" param` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API. 
  

## Sample success response:

``` json

    status: true,
    messsage: "issue has been created"
}

```

## Details:

- This API is used to integrate a project with Zapier for a user.
    

| **Parametes** | **Data Type** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `project_kuid` | `string` | `kuid of the project to be integrated with Zapier` |
| `token` | `string` | `Url provided by Zapier after successfull authentication` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to integrate a project with MS Teams for a user.
    

| **Parametes** | **Data Type** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `project_kuid` | `string` | `kuid of the project to be integrated with MS Teams` |
| `token` | `string` | `Url provided by MS Teams after successfull authentication` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to integrate a project with Slack for a user.
    

| **Parametes** | **Data Type** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `project_kuid` | `string` | `kuid of the project to be integrated with Slack` |
| `token` | `string` | `Url provided by Slack after successfull authentication` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to get list of integrations (active and inactive) for a project.
    

| **Parametes** | **Data Type** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `project_kuid` | `string` | `kuid of the project` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to toggle integration state (ON/OFF) in a project.
    

| **Parametes** | **Data Type** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `integration_kuid` | `string` | `kuid of the integration (received in integrations API)` |
| `state` | `enum = "0", "1"` | `0 means off, 1 means on` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to toggle integration state (ON/OFF) in a project.
    

| **Parametes** | **Data Type** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `integration_kuid` | `string` | `kuid of the integration (received in integrations API)` |
| `state` | `enum = "0", "1"` | `0 means off, 1 means on` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to create test suite
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project kuid in which the user want to create test suite` |
| `title (string) (mandatory)` | `title of the suite` |
| `description (string) (mandatory)` | `description of the suite` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to fetch test suite
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project kuid in which the user want to create test suite` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to search test suite
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project kuid in which the user want to create test suite` |
| `title (sting) (mandatory)` | `title of a suite` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to update test suite
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project kuid in which the user want to create test suite` |
| `suite_kuid (sting) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the suite in which you want to update details` |
| `title (string) (mandatory)` | `title of the suite` |
| `description (string) (mandatory)` | `description of the suite` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to create test case
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project kuid in which the user want to create test suite` |
| `type (sting) (mandatory)` | `type of the test case (functional or non_function)` |
| `title (string) (mandatory)` | `title of the suite` |
| `description (string) (mandatory)` | `description of the suite` |
| `subStepCount (Number) (mandatory)` | `Count of Steps in a test case` |
| `subSteps (string) (mandatory)` | `subSteps is a array of object in each object there are 2 keys and 2 values (step, expedtecResult)` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to Fetch test case
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |

request.description:
## Details:

- This API is used tosearch bugs.
- Upon http status code 403, show a relevant message i.e. user does not have permission to create project in a specific workspace.
- Upon http status code 503, call mobile/web app handshake again and then sign in user.
- NOTE: Make sure, among parameters: search_query, tags, assignees, status, at least 1 parameter must not be empty.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is creating project` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `title of the project` |
| `search_query (string) (mandatory)` | `the text to be searched in bugs' title or description   (can be sent empty)` |
| `tags (array) (mandatory)` | `array of tags ids   (can be sent empty array)` |
| `assignees (array) (mandatory)` | `array of assignees' ids   (can be sent empty array)` |
| `status (string) (mandatory)` | `resolution status of the bug i.e to_do, in-progress, done` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to create test run
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project kuid in which the user want to create test run` |
| `title (sting) (mandatory)` | `title of a Test Run` |
| `description (string) (mandatory)` | `description of the test run` |
| `assignee_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | kuid of the user |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to fetch test run
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project kuid in which the user want to fetch test run` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

request.description:
## Details:

- This API is used to update test case
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project kuid in which the user want to create test suite` |
| `testCaseId (int) (mandatory)` | `Test Case Id in which you want to update` |
| `type (sting) (mandatory)` | `type of the test case (functional or non_function)` |
| `title (string) (mandatory)` | `title of the suite` |
| `description (string) (mandatory)` | `description of the suite` |
| `subStepCount (Number) (mandatory)` | `Count of Steps in a test case` |
| `subSteps (string) (mandatory)` | `subSteps is a array of object in each object there are 2 keys and 2 values (step, expedtecResult)` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to delete test suite
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project kuid in which the user want to create test suite` |
| `suite_kuid (sting) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the suite in which you want to update details` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to delete test case
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project kuid in which the user want to create test suite` |
| `testCaseId (int) (mandatory)` | `test Czse Id` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to fetch releases
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace_kuid in which you want to fetch release` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project_kuid in which you want to fetch releases` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API. 
  

EndFragment

## Details:

- This API is used to upload apk file
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace_kuid in which you want to upload release` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project_kuid in which you want to upload release` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API. 
  

EndFragment

## Details:

- This API is used to fetch releases
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace_kuid in which you want to fetch release` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project_kuid in which you want to fetch releases` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API. 
  

EndFragment

## Details:

- This API is used to create group
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `name (string) (mandatory)` | `name of a group` |
| `description (sting) (optional)` | `description of a group` |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace_kuid in which you want to create group` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project_kuid in which you want to create group` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API. 
  

EndFragment

## Details:

- This API is used to create groups
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `release_kuid (string) (optional)` | `release in which you want to fetch groups` |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace_kuid in which you want to fetch group` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project_kuid in which you want to fetch group` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API. 
  

EndFragment

## Details:

- This API is used to create tester
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `name (string) (mandatory)` | `name of a tester` |
| `email(sting) (mandatory)` | `email of a tester` |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace_kuid in which you want to create tester` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project_kuid in which you want to create tester` |
| `group_kuid (string) (optional)` | `group in which you want to add` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API. 
  

EndFragment

## Details:

- This API is used to fetch tester
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `release_kuid (string) (optional)` | `release in which you want to fetch tester` |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace_kuid in which you want to fetch tester` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project_kuid in which you want to fetch tester` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to update tester name
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `name (string) (mandatory)` | `name of a tester` |
| `tester_kuid (sting) (mandatory)` | `kuid of a tester` |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the workspace` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of teh project` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API. 
  

EndFragment

StartFragment

## Details:

- This API is used to add testers in a release
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `tester_kuid (array) (mandatory)` | `kuids of the tesers` |
| `release_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the release` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API. 
  

EndFragment

EndFragment

## Details:

- This API is used to fetch releases
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace_kuid in which you want to fetch release` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project_kuid in which you want to fetch releases` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API. 
  

EndFragment

## Details:

- This API is used to fetch releases
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace_kuid in which you want to fetch release` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project_kuid in which you want to fetch releases` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API. 
  

EndFragment

## Details:

- This API is used to remove tester
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `tester_kuid (sting) (mandatory)` | `kuid of a tester` |
| `release_kuid (string) (manadatory)` | `release in which you want to remove` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to delete tester
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `tester_kuid (sting) (mandatory)` | `kuid of a tester` |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the workspace` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to delete Group
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace_kuid in which you want to delete group` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `project_kuid in which you want to delete group` |
| `group_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the group that you want to delete` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API. 
  

EndFragment
